detail_desc: Calf-length jersey dress with short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in patterned scuba jersey with a high waist, pockets in the side seams and a concealed button and zip at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in ribbed cotton jersey with an embroidered frill trim at the top and over the shoulder straps.
Sleeveless top in ribbed cotton jersey with an embroidered frill trim at the top and over the shoulder straps.
Sleeveless top in ribbed cotton jersey with an embroidered frill trim at the top and over the shoulder straps.
Trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with an elasticated waist, a fake welt pocket at the back and ankle-length flared legs with sewn-in creases.
Leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist and  fake front pockets.
Leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist and  fake front pockets.
Two pairs of slim-fit jeans in different colours of washed stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Two pairs of slim-fit jeans in different colours of washed stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Jersey T-shirt in a modal blend with a silicone text print, dropped shoulders and straight-cut hem.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey with a deep V-neck front and back. Unlined.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey with a deep V-neck front and back. Unlined.
Shorts in sturdy cotton jersey with a high paper bag waist, decorative pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly.
Shorts in sturdy cotton jersey with a high paper bag waist, decorative pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and buttons down the front. Small chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and buttons down the front. Small chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft, fine cotton knit with a ribbed hem.
Hat in a soft, fine cotton knit with a ribbed hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Cotton chambray shirt with a button-down collar, French front, chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Vest top in soft ribbed jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell with a V-neck front and back.
Vest top in soft ribbed jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell with a V-neck front and back.
Fitted top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Top in airy, textured jersey with a deep V-neck, decorative knot detail at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Top in airy, textured jersey with a deep V-neck, decorative knot detail at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a sheen. Elastication and a flounce at the top, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt.

Cargo trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a zip fly and button, and flap front, back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Slim legs with decorative stitching at the knees.
Polo shirt in striped cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Polo shirt in striped cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Polo shirt in striped cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.
Pleated, calf-length skirt with an elasticated waist and all-over print.
Padded bomber jacket with a faux fur collar, zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem.

Set with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of chinos in a cotton weave. Shirt with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and a detachable bow tie with an elastic strap. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button and side pockets. Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Joggers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets, a fake fly and elasticated hems.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and seams at the knees.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and seams at the knees.
Leggings in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Decorative seams at the knees.
Short-sleeved top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with an open back with ties at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with an open back with ties at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with an open back with ties at the hem.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Long-sleeved bodysuit in a shirt style made in a soft cotton weave with a button-down collar, button placket and chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, buttoned cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede sides, two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Imitation suede inside. Size approx. 7.5x27x33 cm.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede sides, two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Imitation suede inside. Size approx. 7.5x27x33 cm.
Jersey-lined, pull-on trousers in lightweight washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets and fake flap pockets on the legs.

Set with a top and pair of jeggings. Top in sweatshirt fabric with soft, padded appliqués on the front, long sleeves, concealed press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Jeggings in a stretch cotton blend with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Matching pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Matching pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Matching pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Hi-top boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details, fleece linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details, fleece linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Fleece-lined boots with a water-repellent rubber lower section and soles. Soft shaft in water-repellent functional fabric with reflective strips at the bottom. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the ankle and an elasticated drawstring at the top.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

All-in-one suit in soft fleece with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and contrasting colour zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
